Comments_List: Basics of Spanish grammar and the starting of delving deeper into the nuances of Spanish grammar as a lead in to Spanish 140
I improved my language skills in Spanish

Strengths: Starts from the beginning so this is a great place to refresh but also it goes beyond basics.

Weaknesses: The book could be better, it's your average Spanish book.
Yes! Learning another language is rewarding and this is a well structured class to help you learn Spanish!
